about_the_game:
The object of Ticker Tape is to buy and sell commodities with your friends to see who can be the biggest Wall Street Fat-Cat!
- Speculate low value stocks will rise to be re-sold for a profit!
- Cry as the stocks you paid too much for plummet for the second time in one turn!

Overview of Game
Random commodities (Stocks) values are rolled once a round by each Player. They can either go up, down, or pay dividends.
Once rolling is complete, every player will buy and sell their stocks.
Once the chosen amount of turns is complete, the players scores are tallied up to see who is the better 1%er!

Customization
Each game can be customized by the game Host.
Options to modernize stocks, change time limits, and turn limits.
Options for random events to keep the matches spicy

Play
Play with steam friends
join a Quick Play to be put you into the next open game

name: Ticker Tape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4470K CPU @ 3.50GHz
  • Memory: 16.4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Buy and sell commodities with friends to see who will be the fattest Wall Street Cat! Speculate low value stocks will rise to be re-sold for a profit! Cry as the stocks you paid too much for plummet for the second time in one turn!
